name: Truck Amuck
description:
Truck Amuck is like a matador bullfight, but instead of one bull, it's INFINITE MONSTER TRUCKS. Stay alive for as long as possible to get as many points as possible!

Controls:

* "Z" to dodge;

* "X " to taunt;

* Arrows to move.

Take a peek on game trailer by clicking here!

Team: Adam Kay, Arpit Aggarwal, Ezra Lau, Isaac Kellis, Kelle Lima, and Tri Nguyen

Install Instructions: Download > Unzip > Double-click "TruckGame.exe" inside the folder > Have FUN
